metaData.subtitle: Plan a visit to the trails.

form.title: Hike Title
form.questionText: What do you want to call your hike?

form.title: Location
form.questionText: Where do you want to hike?
Where do you want everyone to meet?

form.title: Date
form.questionText: When is your hike?

form.title: Time
form.questionText: What time should everybody be at the trailhead?

form.title: Meet Location
form.questionText: Where should everyone meet?

form.title: Meet Time
form.questionText: What time should everybody get to your meet place?

form.title: Leave Time
form.questionText: What time do you plan to leave your meet place?

form.title: End Time
form.questionText: Around what time will you return from the hike?

form.title: Distance
form.questionText: Hike Distance (in miles)?

form.title: Description
form.questionText: What additional information do you want everyone to know about this hike?
